sentences.en: "Why didn't you tell me before?" asked Hunter harshly.
sentences.cn: “你为什么不早告诉我？”亨特厉声问道。

sentences.en: “If we are afraid, if we throw away this opportunity, then history will judge us very harshly,” Mr Papandreou said in a final appeal for support before the vote.
sentences.cn: 帕潘德里欧在投票前最后一次寻求支持的讲话中说：“如果我们害怕，如果我们放弃这次机会，那么历史将会非常严厉地审判我们。”

sentences.en: Ahead I could hear the Exhorter barking harshly to the crowd.
sentences.cn: 我听到那个“规劝者”就在前面恶声恶气地向听众乱叫.
格兰奇的回答有点刺耳.

sentences.en: He has a sharp tongue , ie often speaks harshly or angrily.
He was harshly attacked by critics.
sentences.cn: 他受到批评家们的严厉批评.

sentences.en: He will find his every step more harshly spotlighted than has been the case previously.
sentences.cn: 他会发现与以往相比，他的每一步都会吸引人们更加密切的关注。

sentences.en: I think you're judging her rather harshly.
sentences.cn: 我想你对她的评判过于苛刻.

sentences.en: Rather than judging the disciples too harshly, we would do well to examine the reason for their slumbers.
sentences.cn: 我们不应过于严厉地论断这些门徒们，但是可以好好地探究一下他们睡着的原因。

sentences.en: She was harshly criticized by the left - wing press.
sentences.cn: 她常常受到左派报纸的严厉抨击.

sentences.en: The artificially hardened voice rose harshly and hung there.
sentences.cn: 粗哑的假嗓音响了起来,在那里荡漾.

sentences.en: The atrocious name grated harshly on my ear.
sentences.cn: 这十恶不赦的名字,在我听来非常刺耳.

sentences.en: The grit beneath her soles grated harshly on the wooden deck.
sentences.cn: 粘在她鞋底的沙砾蹭在木甲板上发出刺耳的声音.

sentences.en: The state dealt harshly with poor people who committed offences against nobles.
sentences.cn: 如果穷人侵犯了贵族的利益,他们就会受到严厉的制裁.

sentences.en: This affair has been settled too harshly.
We should not judge the young writers too harshly.
sentences.cn: 我们不应当对青年作家太苛求.

sentences.en: When the U.S. leaves, many Iraqis say, they can deal with the terrorists and their patrons more harshly.
sentences.cn: 许多伊拉克人认为，一旦美国人离开，他们就能更加严厉地对付恐怖分子和他们的支持者。

sentences.en: You had little cause to judge him so harshly.
sentences.cn: 你没有什么理由这样严厉地批评他。

words.tran_cn: 严厉的；严酷的；刺耳的；粗糙的；刺目的

trans.tran_cn: 粗糙地，刺耳地，严厉地，苛刻
